# The `VPWidenIntOrFpInductionRecipe` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A recipe for handling phi nodes of integer and floating-point inductions, producing their vector values. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::VPWidenIntOrFpInductionRecipe</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

A recipe for handling phi nodes of integer and floating-point inductions, producing their vector values.

Definition at line 2146 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplan-h">VPlan.h</a>.

### isCanonical() {#aebed30683f6b89d62f06d2a10786c2e3}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool VPWidenIntOrFpInductionRecipe::isCanonical () const">
Returns true if the induction is canonical, i.e.

starting at 0 and incremented by UF &#42; VF (= the original IV is incremented by 1) and has the same type as the canonical induction.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplan-h/#l02205">2205</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplan-h">VPlan.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplanrecipes-cpp/#l01872">1872</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplanrecipes-cpp">VPlanRecipes.cpp</a>.
